title: Rhubarb Crisp
ingredients: grated rind and juice of 1 orange
cream, yogurt, or custard, to serve
1 3/4cups all-purpose white or whole wheat flour
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F. Cut the rhubarb into 1-inch lengths and place in a 2-quart casserole dish with the sugar and orange rind and juice.

2. To make the crisp topping, sift the flour into a bowl. Rub in the butter with your fingertips until the mixture resembles fine bread crumbs. Stir in the brown sugar and ginger. Spread evenly over the fruit and press down lightly using a fork.
3. Place the dish on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 25–30 minutes, until the topping is golden brown. Serve warm with cream, yogurt, or stirred custard.
